version_name: 4.12.0 We’ve added Social to mobile! From the equity quotes overview page
4.12.0 We’ve added Social to mobile! From the equity quotes overview page
4.12.0 We’ve added Social to mobile! From the equity quotes overview page

version_description:
What’s New 4.12.1
Fixed watch list display problem experienced by some clients.

Recent updates—Version 4.12.0

We’ve added Social to mobile!

From the equity quotes overview page, scroll down to Social Signals to see 7-day volume and sentiment. For more details, tap on Social Signals or scroll over to the Social tab and:

· Tap into Twitter conversations and see links and trends
· See social sentiment about publicly traded companies and their 7-day tweet volume
· Discover potential trade ideas
· Get the news before it surfaces in traditional outlets

Also in this release:

· Optimized display to scale to iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
· Charts candlesticks now fully displayed
· Fixed option strike price display
· Other bug fixes

Please note: This is the last version to support iOS 8.

What’s New 4.12.1
Fixed watch list display problem experienced by some clients.

Also in this release:

We’ve added Social to mobile!

From the equity quotes overview page, scroll down to Social Signals to see 7-day volume and sentiment. For more details, tap on Social Signals or scroll over to the Social tab and:

What’s new in version 4.13:

Touch ID for log-in

Now you can log in with your fingerprint when you enable Touch ID.

Bug fixes:

•Back button on the Quotes Detail page works consistently
•Tot/Day Gain toggle no longer resets
•Back button from a news article takes you to the previous page’s last location

What’s new in version 4.13:

Touch ID for log-in

Now you can log in with your fingerprint when you enable Touch ID.

Bug fixes:

•Back button on the Quotes Detail page works consistently
•Tot/Day Gain toggle no longer resets
•Back button from a news article takes you to the previous page’s last location

What’s new in version 4.14.0:

Statements and tax documents

•Go to Accounts, select your account, and scroll to the Documents tab
•Download and view up to 10 years of statements and up to 7 years of tax documents in PDF format

Today Widget
View your local watch list and access the app with one touch.

Touch ID log-in prompt
Be automatically prompted to log in when you launch the app if you have Touch ID enabled for log-in.

Note: When you enable Touch ID you disable auto log-in. To restore auto log-in, disable Touch ID for log-in and select Remember Me next to UserID and password.

“Forgot Password?” link
Tap “Forgot Password?” on the log-in screen to reset your password.

Price Alerts
- Create and manage Price Alerts - tap on the new "bell" icon on Quotes, Research, Accounts, and Positions
- Create stock, ETF, and indices alerts based on Last, Bid, Ask, or Mark price
- Receive alerts whether you're in or out of the app
- Manage alerts from Mobile Trader, Trade Architect®, and thinkorswim®

3D Touch on our launch icon
Quickly navigate to Trade, Accounts, Market Overview, or Watch Lists.

Tax season reminder
Get your tax documents and statements in our app; go to Accounts, select your account, and scroll over to the Docs tab.

Trading upgrades!

Options strategy chains
View a chain for 11 available options strategies 
Customize your chains with 13 available columns 
Load the trade ticket with one tap for any two-leg strategy
View the strategy direction/outlook before building a trade

Trade ticket enhancements
Price default for two-leg strategies is now the midpoint between the bid and ask
Select and close a two-leg strategy from the Positions page
Use price steppers to increase or decrease price, shares, or contracts
View your options strategy name on the options trade ticket 
View Stocks or Options Buying Power on the ticket

Review order screen
View the "Position Quantities" of your stock or options order to compare the pre-trade to the estimated post-trade impact on your position

What's new in 4.19.0:

Education section
Browse videos on investing strategies, stocks, options, and exchange-traded funds (ETFs)—go to More > Education

Price alerts for single-leg options
- Create alerts based on last, bid, ask, mark, or delta
- Set price conditions for alerts: above, above or at , below, below or at
- Manage supported alert types created from Mobile Trader, Trade Architect®, and thinkorswim®

Inbound wire instructions—to view, go to More > Transfer Funds

iMessage app extension
Share a U.S. markets overview or a quote detail snapshot for any symbol in an iMessage with any of your contacts who also have an Apple device. To get started, open an iMessage, type a contact’s name, and tap the app extension icon. Then, tap the TD Ameritrade Mobile icon to view and share content.

Optimized for iPhone X, including Face ID support

Bug fixes

What’s New in 4.22

Videos in the News tab (iPhone only)
Reuters and CNBC on-demand videos on the Research page have been moved to the News tab for easier access.

Real Estate sector
Real Estate is now included in the Sectors tab on the Research page.

Security enhancements
· Set more security preferences, including app inactivity time-out (choose from a range of 5 minutes to 8 hours)
· "Remember password" no longer supported, but easily log in with Touch ID or Face ID

Chat (Beta)

With Apple Business Chat, Client Services is a tap away. Go to More > Contact Us, and tap the chat button. Then, chat with an automated agent or type “agent” at any time to speak with a Client Services representative.

Note: This feature requires iOS 11.3 or later.

· Display 45+ new data points

More Positions data showing on iPad
•Taking advantage of the iPad’s screen size, we hid the side Watch List on the Positions page
•Tap Show Watch List to restore it

Positions page enhancements
•Optimized columns for iPhone and iPad lets you tap Settings to create a display with only the columns you want to see (custom view only)
•Relocated the Settings icon on both devices

Trade ticket and Create Alerts page improvements
•A streamlined experience with a clean look and feel

Supports 2018 iPad Pro models

More Positions data showing on iPad
· Hid the side Watch List on the Positions page to take advantage of the iPad screen size
· Tap Show Watch List to restore it

Positions page enhancements (custom view only)
· Relocated the Settings icon
· Tap Settings to create a custom view with only the columns you want to see
· Optimized displays provide distinct views of your data
· Switch between standard and custom view with the “page view” toggle on the far right of the account selector

Trade ticket and Create Alerts page improvements
· A streamlined experience with a clean look and feel

Introducing Dashboard (iPhone only)—our new landing screen with quick access to essential info

•Access the Markets screen from the redesigned More menu

New features make it faster and easier to deposit checks. Improvements include:

Automatic capture of check images
• Real-time guidance and feedback during an improved check-capture process
• Better check acceptance rates from high-quality images

A simplified online deposit form that streamlines entries

Faster access to ACH deposits
Make an ACH bank transfer by 7 p.m. ET on a business day for immediate access to your funds (some trading restrictions apply)

New custom columns for the Positions page
•Track bond coupon rates and maturity dates by adding two new fields to your Dashboard
•Tap the Settings icon in the Positions section, then look for the Coupon rate and Maturity date column labels in the fixed-income data section

More dividend fields available on the Watch List and Positions pages
On the Custom Columns tab, tap the gear icon to add:
•Dividend frequency
•Dividend next pay date
•Dividend per share

Daily Market Update dashboard module
Stay up to date with the markets with analysis from TD Ameritrade Chief Market Strategist JJ Kinahan.

Make it yours—tap “Customize this page” from the dashboard to choose which modules to display and in what order.

Performance enhancements and bug fixes

Balance history charts
See a visual display of your balance history for individual or combined accounts on the dashboard and balances pages.

Bank account setup
Add connections between your bank and TD Ameritrade accounts for cash deposits and withdrawals. To set up an ACH connection, visit the Transfer Funds page and tap Manage Connections.

Tax document alerts
Stay up to date this tax season with push notifications. Know as soon as you have a tax document available, or we’ll let you know if you won’t receive a tax document for this tax year. To get these alerts, enable push notifications in your device settings.

Benzinga Stock Analysis for big movers:

When a stock qualifies as one of the market’s biggest daily movers in price or volume, you’ll see our new “Why is it moving?” section—featuring Benzinga analysis—on the stock overview page.

New alerts

Please enable push notifications on your device and toggle on from the app’s Settings page to get alerts for:

• Order fills 

Know when your stock, ETF, options, and mutual fund orders are filled or partially filled. Toggle on from the app's Settings page.

• ACH 

Get withdrawal and deposit status updates.
